DataElement.preferredName: FSFI 15 Past 4 Weeks Satisfaction Sexual Relationship with Partner Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how satisfied they have been in the past 4 weeks with their sexual relationship with their partner, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Female Sexual Function Index Past 4 Weeks Satisfaction of Sexual Relationship with Partner Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 19-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure sexual function in women. It was developed for assessing domains of sexual functioning (e.g. sexual arousal, orgasm, satisfaction, pain) in women participating in clinical trials for arousal disorders._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._A question about how satisfied an individual is or has been with the sexual relationship with their partner._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 19-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure sexual function in women. It was developed for assessing domains of sexual functioning (e.g. sexual arousal, orgasm, satisfaction, pain) in women participating in clinical trials for arousal disorders.

Concepts.definition: A 19-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure sexual function in women. It was developed for assessing domains of sexual functioning (e.g. sexual arousal, orgasm, satisfaction, pain) in women participating in clinical trials for arousal disorders.

Concepts.longName: Satisfaction of Sexual Relationship with Partner
Concepts.definition: A question about how satisfied an individual is or has been with the sexual relationship with their partner.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating a high level of satisfaction.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Over the past 4 weeks, how sa
ReferenceDocuments.description: Over the past 4 weeks, how satisfied have you been with your sexual relationship with your partner?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Manual Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure.
